name: Red Apple Factory
description:
This is Frank.

He works at Red Apple Factory.

They take green apples and paint them red.

Sometimes, mistakes happen and an apple becomes yellow.

Red Apple Factory can't sell yellow apples, so they throw them away.

Frank doesn't like to waste food.

He gathers all the yellow apples and puts them in a gift box for people in need.

A full gift box is able to feed five homeless people.

Frank gets a warning for every mistake he makes. He gets fired after three warnings.

Someone's failure is others' progress.

Controls

Drag And Drop: Left Mouse Button

Move: A / D

Jump: Space

Interact: Right Mouse Button / E

Pause: ESC / P

Red Apple Factory is my entry for the Wowie Jam 3.0. The theme was FAILURE IS PROGRESS.

This was my second game jam and everything was created within 72 hours.
